channel.title: Components on Experiences of a developer
channel.description: Recent content in Components on Experiences of a developer

item.title: JAXConf-2012: JSF - Components & Mobile
item.description: JAX Conf 2012 RichFaces represented at the “2012 JAX conference”:http://jaxconf.com/2012/ in San Francisco this week. I presented three times on two JSF topics. The conference was overall a great success in my opinion - while not the most highly attended conference at which I’ve presented, those that attended were highly engaged and happy to have such direct access to the speakers. Indeed this was one of my preferred aspects to JAX conf.
